description: Tables showing listings of all allocations by budget title and value to national health service organisations for the years 1997/98 to 2005/06; total expenditure of the centrally funded, initiatives services and special allocations programme for the years 1997/98 to 2005/06; special allocations issued with initial allocations for the years 1997/98 to 2005/06 and special allocations and associated budgets issued to NHS organisations as additional allocations (and which are included in the tables described above).
